item.title: How to make it show special bar?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:2, topic:435559”]in itemassistant

add the case in a format like this

            case 14484: //dragon claws
            c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7800);
            specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7812);
            break;

use the same interface ;D[/quote]

There is no ItemAssistant.java

item.title: How to make it show special bar?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Well, I recently fixed my Special.java (I think), however, I don’t know how to make it show the special bar and execute the special by clicking it. This is my Special.java:

package com.rs.worldserver.model.player;

import com.rs.worldserver.model.player.CombatManager;

/**
  * Special.java
  *
  * @Author Arham 4
  *
  * Special.java to manage specials.
  */
  
public class Special {

	public static final int specialOnPlayer(final CombatManager cm, final int weapon, final int EnemyX,
        final int EnemyY, final int absX, final int absY, final int voidmelee) {
        switch (weapon) {
		
		case 5698:
			return 252;
		
		                        }
                        cm.specAttack();
						cm.actionInterval = cm.getbattletimer();
                        cm.lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
		return voidmelee;
	}
}

Thanks,
Arham

P.S: Please explain the code.
P.S: I am using https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,420023.0.html

Read full topic
